typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		SOURCE_CODE_KEY as string,
		SOURCE_SYSTEM as string,
		TARGET_CODE as string,
		TARGET_DESCRIPTION as string,
		CODE_TYPE as string,
		CODE_TYPE_ID as double,
		CODE2 as string,
		OM_X_REF as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> source1
source1 filter(CODE_TYPE_ID == 106.0  && TARGET_CODE !='PI') ~> Filter1
Filter1 aggregate(groupBy(TARGET_CODE),
	TARGET_DESCRIPTION = first(TARGET_DESCRIPTION)) ~> Aggregate1
Aggregate1 derive(GRP_CODE = case(TARGET_CODE =='EN' || TARGET_CODE =='BU', 'EG', case( TARGET_CODE =='PM' || TARGET_CODE =='PF', 'PI', TARGET_CODE)),
		GRP_DESCRIPTION = case(TARGET_CODE =='EN' || TARGET_CODE =='BU', 'Energy+', case( TARGET_CODE =='PM' || TARGET_CODE =='PF', 'P&I', TARGET_CODE)),
		BUA_DESCRIPTION = case( TARGET_CODE =='PM' || TARGET_CODE =='PF', 'P&I', TARGET_CODE),
		BUA_CODE = case( TARGET_CODE =='PM' || TARGET_CODE =='PF', 'PI', TARGET_CODE)) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 derive({Business Area} = @(GrpDesc=GRP_DESCRIPTION,
		BuaDesc=BUA_DESCRIPTION,
		BusDesc=TARGET_DESCRIPTION)) ~> MakeHierarchy
MakeHierarchy sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Sink
